title: may I have some video's of "good" yasuos?
body: If you do not already know why I would ask someone else to get it for me then don't concern yourself with the fact that I would. Just do it or don't. I want to see what others view as "good" yasuos.

replies.body: there are good yasuos?... i thought they just mash the keyboard and dash around murdering people mostly by accident
then show me a video of them doing this

> [{quoted}](name=CerealBoxOfDoom,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4EOKnvpq,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-08-17T11:07:06.328+0000)
>
> then show me a video of them doing this

I would be bored to tears if I ever watched any yasuo videos, so I don't have any.  

Perhaps if you asked about a real champ?

ahri is the only real champ, but I'm already watching an ahri video.

yasuo needs to be in it to see what I'm tryinig to look at but it has to be a particularly good yasuo
I'd argue Trinimmortal, but even he states that his videos lack certain skill levels since he plays with friends of widely different Elos.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JTC5Pj4MRn0

here's what I got for this one

outdated though but it has what I'm looking for
You're welcome. Sorry I couldn't be of more help.

good enough, someone elses opinion is all I needed. I'm seeing confirmations of things I've been thinking about vs him. 

I've yet to see a yasuo really freeze a lane. He can farm under tower but his playpattern for doing so seems very unsafe compared to others.
Well he is a very aggressive champion. He's meant to be rewarded by playing so.
its one thing to be aggressive, its quite another when you can't afford to not be aggressive
Someone's got a hate-on for yasuo, check out the up/downvotes, lol.
yes, probably. Probably the same shitters who will come back and cry about how the big mean yasuo made them poop themselves.
Dade who used to be a world class midlaner has some decent Yasuo plays https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ML31mtvbS_k
